item.description:
Getting parents and kids together again to climb at Boston Rock Gym (BRG). Parents can belay for each other while the younger ones work out on the auto belays, the tread wall and the bouldering cave. The kids love to challenge and encourage each other in the bouldering cave with this game to see who can place the flag in the most challenging location. BRG is popular with families on a Saturday night.

We're scheduling this late enough to let the kids get back from basketball, hockey or whatever team sport that is going on earlier. Please come join me and my son for some fun.

We're also going to grab a bite to eat at Tudo Na Brasa in Woburn (414 Main Street Woburn, MA) at around 4:45pm. Join us for Brazilian BBQ before climbing.

What else are you going to do on a cold Saturday night with the kids, read a book?

See you soon,
Douglas
item.how_to_find_us: Look for us in the room with the benches, or if arriving late in the main climbing room.
item.name: Climbing with Kids (1/8/2011)
